General.Name: NEP Realty and Industry Public Company Limited
General.Description: NEP Realty and Industry Public Company Limited engages in the production and distribution of plastic packaging products in Thailand. It is also involved in the investment business. The company was founded in 1953 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

0.Name: Mr. Vee  Worasakyothin
0.Title: Acting MD, Deputy MD of Fin. & Accounting, CFO and Director
